website_summaries.verdict: Reputable and trusted brand-name chelated copper supplement.
pros: Free of gluten, soy, and dairy
Rave reviews of decrease in arthritis pain and in gray hairs
Excellent choice to pair with a zinc supplement
cons: Some consumers experienced sensitivity to this product

customer_reviews.title: Cheated Copper Has Many Benefits
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. I tend to have cold feet at times, but taking copper gets the circulation going and my feel warm right up. Copper helps cleans arteries, tighten sagging skin, prevent wrinkles and turn hair from gray back to normal color with regular use. Gray hair means a stroke/aneurysm is brewing, per Dr Wallach. His example was Einstein when he had all the gray hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anngel

customer_reviews.title: Great Cures
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife for 3years, it reduced aortic aneurysm to nothing in less than 1 year. Doctor said they must have made a mistake with the previous Ultasound!!!! He won't admit it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Staffeld

customer_reviews.title: Chelated Copper really works
customer_reviews.text: My husband, now deceased, and I have taken copper for years. My husband had rheumatism in hands, neck, and anywhere one could get rheumatism. Copper alleviated the pain and let him move as if nothing was wrong with him. I have some rheumatism in my hands and probably other places as well. Taking copper lets me continue doing bead and needle work without any hindrance.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Crum

customer_reviews.title: helps raise body temperature
customer_reviews.text: I feel really good on this supplement. It's also a precursor to neurotransmitters serotonin and dopamine, so it helps with mood and muscle strength.
customer_reviews.author: A.DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: I dont know if it is a bad batch or if it is the ingredients, but it gave me liver pain.
customer_reviews.text: Gave me liver pain every time i took them. And i tested it to verify if it was this one or my other vitamins. This one was the one that gave me pain in my liver (top right side under my rib) everytime i took it.
customer_reviews.author: TheOne

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking this for 2 days now! Yesterday which was day 1, my body felt really warm and it lasted about an hour on and off but than today which is day two I feel fine no side effects thus far. I'm only taking half a pill since the dose is 2.5 grams. I'm also getting copper in my multivitamin so I just wanted to add a little bit more to my daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports says many vitamin Mfrs put a lot less vitamin in the tablets than the label says. I started buying Solgar vitamins because they come in glass bottles and I have been trying to get plastics out of my life. However I came down with severe symptoms. To stop these symptoms I am having to take two or three tablets for every one I used to take. Unfortunately taking too much of various vitamins and minerals is downright dangerous. Because Solgar mislabels its products, it is impossible to know how much one is actually taking.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney T.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the third bottle of copper that I have bought. I also have bought vitamin e and zinc picolinate from solgar and they are all fantastic. Solgar makes quality vitamins & supplements that I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Kim garrity

customer_reviews.title: Easiest (on stomach) to take of all Copper supps
customer_reviews.text: To treat an unusual Copper deficiency I've tried quite a few brands - some very rough on stomach, etc. These are not at all, and I can take with or without food. Bought Solgar for many years for others, glad to find these.
customer_reviews.author: libcat11

customer_reviews.title: solgar - Chelated Copper
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product. Although I haven’t noticed any particular improvements to any specific aspects of my health. I am happy to get my copper levels up as my blood test has shown that I have/had low levels.
customer_reviews.author: l2travel

customer_reviews.title: I like Solgar products
customer_reviews.text: Used to help prevent Covid19. Supposedly Viruses don't like copper. I guess will see if it works? I can't taste ( not due to Covid19, I have nerve damage), but to be fair I just put 5 stars. I'm sure it probably tastes like copper though.
customer_reviews.author: Riverruns2me

customer_reviews.title: Cheated copper
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement - I use it to keep my hair from graying -Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have taken these for about a month. I will try to continue for another 3 months. No difference in hair color. I can't take these on an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help with my night time leg cramps and it works great. I also like that it comes in a amber glass bottle to ensure the ingredients do not get contaminated.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Solgar has long had a reputation of being The Best.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used Solgar brand for a long time. I live in a very rural area, and walmart's convenience has been seductive. I needed Copper, and since I believe Solgar to the best on the market, I went there. We shall see how copper works for me; but, I am happy and uplisted that Solgar still uses glass bottles. It's in the details. Thanks much.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to know how well it’s working, but seems ok. No obvious issues.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: HIGH QUALITY! BETWEEN THE SOLGAR COPPER & SOLGAR HAIR,SKIN & NAILS! OUR HAIR GREW BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what this says.
customer_reviews.text: Never used the product before. Heard it had a lot of good benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah Rendon

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Solar products are high quality supplements. I am satisfied with this product. I needed to add zinc and copper to my supplemental needs, and although I've only been taking it for a short time, I feel my energy level has improved.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen R. Bisono-Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping, product as described. I'm deficient on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping, product as described. I'm deficient on copper so I'll update my review in 6 months to tell you if it works to improve those lab results.
customer_reviews.author: Lollipop

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is and that's just what it is. Period.
customer_reviews.text: All my gray hair magically vanished!!! Just KIDDING. It is what it is, and that's just what it is. Okay, I did not do a chemical analysis, but here's trusting it is what it is. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Holden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Copper we need and pennies are losing the battle. Dots connected.
customer_reviews.author: scout

customer_reviews.title: TRY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product and so far seems to be helping me!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tonjes

customer_reviews.title: Trust this one
customer_reviews.text: Non wary users may not realize that adding Zinc to the male supplement regimen, will likely decrease the presence of Copper in ones system. Chelated absorption of Copper is the best way to go. Solgar has become my trusted vendor for Copper. I am a 71 yr old male supplement / vitamin freak, with a daily arsenal culled from 33 different bottles
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Solgar Chelated Copper Helps Me With Hot Flashes!
customer_reviews.text: Along with zinc, to prevent hot flashes from hyper thyroid; it is the best. Solgar is a great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Norminha Portuguese

customer_reviews.title: Great mineral
customer_reviews.text: I've used copper before over many years. It's great for tinsel strength of your veins and arteries. It's also good for minimizing grey hair naturally. I'm in my mid 50's and I barely have grey hair. One has to come close to see it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: ... sensitivity to this
customer_reviews.text: the product maybe good but I will never know because it made me itch like I had something crawling on me to the poing I couldnt sleep ...
customer_reviews.author: shareekhot2

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick every time I took it😢
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this but it makes me throw up every time I take it. My 23 year old son tried it he threw up too.
customer_reviews.author: shawna m johnston

customer_reviews.title: Weird feeling after
customer_reviews.text: Idk what it is about this or if it's working right.. but each time I take one.. I go from feeling fine normal to feeling nauseated, uneasy all day after taking it.. until the pill wears off I guess. But it has ruined my day feeling good to bad. Do not recommend.. or take with caution.
customer_reviews.author: K Yen

customer_reviews.title: It’s a blue non-coated tablet and very easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Small tablets and meets my doctors requirement for a copper supplement. I was low in copper according to my blood work and after taking this supplement, I’m now at normal levels. It’s a blue non-coated tablet and very easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Necessary with Celiac Disease
customer_reviews.text: I occasionally take copper as it lessens especially with Celiac disease. I take about once or twice a week and that seems to help with my mineral loss. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Britton

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again solgar is a great brand
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I know it's in a glass bottle. Solar is a great company, it tells you what kind of copper is in it, and so far I feel like it helped me with the deficiency that I feel that I have. Lastly this seems to be high quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tha Dragon SourceRa

customer_reviews.title: Halts Your Hair from coming in Gray!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for deterring that stubborn gray hair! I take 1 in the morning & 1 every evening & haven't seen any new gray.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Warf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for Chelated Cooper..
customer_reviews.text: I order this on a regular basis Its a well priced Organic Chelated Mineral and i love it. Highly recommended,
customer_reviews.author: nancy whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does and arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: The.Cat.Heys!

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Importatnt today when our food and soil ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Importatnt today when our food and soil food grown in depleted of copper. Very important nutrient for rebuilding cells and neurons in particular, I think. LOL Thanx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK, not special
customer_reviews.text: It seems about as effective as my standard 2mg copper and the pill is exactly the same size and color. It is hard to tell how well it works because the effects are long term, but I not noticed any reduction of the white in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Seda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am copper deficient and take 6-7mg daily. Ran out of GNC copper tablets so thought I would try these. The quality or formula of these are remarkably different. My copper deficiency symptoms came back within 2 days. Throwing them in the trash and going back to GNC.
customer_reviews.author: Makita455

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it will do what it's designed to do ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it will do what it's designed to do. I take zinc every day, and I understand that needs to be balanced out with copper.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Hill

customer_reviews.title: the most 'bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have researched the supplements that give you the most 'bang for your buck' regarding hair and skin health and appearance. Solgar is one of the most widely recognized brands in quality supplements and I have noticed that I am reaping the benefits. I take it daily and I promise you , you will not regret taking Solgar Chelated Copper! Always consult with your medical health care provider regarding adding this or any supplement to your daily intake!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Scott

product_meta.title: Solgar – Chelated Copper, 100 Tablets
feature_bullets: Essential copper: copper is an essential trace mineral that supports connective tissues like bone, skin, tendons as well as cartilage. It is also essential in the formation of collagen
Bioavailable: the formulation in these tablets provides a patented, highly bioavailable form of chelated copper
